Posts.Title: I want to look at my scans and other tests

Posts.Content: Hi aroma mum Thanks for your reply yes it really nice to speak to someone ells with the same condition as me. I'm really sorry that your cancer have come back but I'm sure you will fight it again. I'm have just got 2 lots of herceptin left. Then I have to have my groseman line out and then I will hopeful not come back until 6 mdr check. I hope that you will stay in contact with me and let me know how you a getting on. God bless you.üåûüå∫üåª
Posts.Title: I want to look at my scans and other tests

Posts.Content: Hi Chloecat 45 Many thanks for your letter I just want to know who do ask about my records at the hospital ? From Tina rose üåûüåæ
Posts.Title: I want to look at my scans and other tests

Posts.Content: Hi my name is tina In 2012just a week before Christmas Day I was diagnosed with inflammatory breast cancer stage 3 I had so many scans and Mir scans done but for one reason the doctor and other staff won't show me the scans the staff and doctored just keep telling me that he can not go into the system I just think that there must be a way for me to see them (it is after all my cancer) I'm just wondering if there is other women out there in same boat like me I just don't know wort I can do about it please if someone can tell me.
Posts.Title: I want to look at my scans and other tests

Posts.Content: Hi my name is tina No you a not going mad I had my operation about a 1 year ago and I'm still not right my under arm is till a bit num and it is as if I have a big lump under my arm. I was told that I might never get the filing back and I have got some nerve damage. I'm going back to the hospital to day to se if there is anything to be done. I'm sure in time you will be a lot better good luck.üåû
